title: Yankees’ Aaron Judge reveals torn ligament in injured toe, does not provide timeline for return
description: New York Yankees slugger Aaron Judge told reporters Saturday he has a torn ligament in his right big toe and would not provide a timeline for his return.

title: BMI measurement deemed ‘racist’ in new medical report: ‘This is politics, not medicine'
description: In a new report, the American Medical Association (AMA) calls for abolishing the body mass index (BMI) as a means of assessing body fat. Dr. Marc Siegel weighed in with reaction.

title: Wagner Group chief likely thought 'odds were not in his favor' before ordering troops to turn around: Expert
description: The leader of the Wagner Group likely thought that the odds were not in his favor in continuing the troops' march to Moscow before ordering them to turn around, an expert said.

title: Ted Cruz calls on House to investigate impeaching Biden over Hunter allegations: 'Direct evidence'
description: Sen. Ted Cruz, R-Texas, is urging the House to consider efforts to impeach President Biden after new WhatsApp messages 'directly' tie him to the "millions of dollars coming from communist China."

title: Rays' Wander Franco returns to lineup after two-game benching for not ‘being the best teammate'
description: Tampa Bay Rays shortstop Wander Franco is in the lineup Saturday against the Kansas City Royals after being benched the previous two games.

title: Kamala Harris ridiculed for post on Roe anniversary as she recounts rage, need to ‘let it all out’ emotionally
description: Twitter users mocked Vice President Kamala Harris on Saturday after she posted a video recounting her need to "let it all out" on overturning Roe.

title: Princess Kate Middleton, Prince William, King Charles show off dazzling Royal Ascot hats
description: Royal family members, Prince and Princess of Wales, King Charles III, Queen Camilla and more stepped out in true regal fashion at the 2023 Royal Ascot.

title: Trump warns about ousting Putin in Russia, says successor could be 'far worse'
description: Former President Donald Trump said on Saturday that any potential successor to Russian President Vladimir Putin could be "far worse" than the controversial incumbent.

title: House Democrats refuse to say whether they believe abortion should be permitted up until birth
description: A handful of House Democrats refused to say this week whether they believe women should be allowed to have an abortion up until the moment of birth.

title: OceanGate Titanic sub: Royal Canadian Mounted Police not ruling out possible criminal investigation
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police is probing whether to launch a criminal investigation into the fatal implosion of the Titan submersible carrying five passengers.

title: Wagner chief orders troops to turn around from Moscow 'to avoid bloodshed'
description: Yevgeny Prigozhin claimed his troops reached Rostov-on-Don without spilling any blood and would turn around to avoid any potential bloodshed.

title: Happy Gilmore hears from Adam Sandler after Ball State commitment: ‘Pulling for you’
description: Happy Gilmore, a high school golfer from Indiana whose real name is Landon, was congratulated by Adam Sandler on Twitter after Gilmore announced his commitment to Ball State.

title: Dem lawmaker claims mercenary rebellion could represent 'unraveling' of Putin regime: 'Existential threat'
description: Rep. Gerry Connolly, D-Va., claimed that a rebellion against Russian military leadership staged by mercenary force Wagner Group could be the "unraveling" of Putin

title: Baltimore woman, an immigrant from Cuba, is one step closer to sainthood
description: The Vatican has advanced for canonization the cause of Mother Mary Lange, an immigrant from Cuba who founded the Oblate Sisters of Providence. The faith-filled woman was of African descent.

title: Thunderstorms will bring flood, tornado risk over the Midwest, Northeast
description: National weather forecasters said severe weather, including thunderstorms, would bring multiple threats over the weekend for residents from the Midwest to the East Coast.

title: Who is Yevgeny Prigozhin, Putin's warlord and Wagner Group founder marching to Moscow?
description: Yevgeny Prigozhin rose to prominence as the founder and chief of a mercenary army, but he started off a humble hot dog vendor in a flea market after the fall of the Soviet Union.

title: Sons of Titan sub crewmember Hamish Harding remember adventurer as 'loving father'
description: U.K. billionaire Hamish Harding's sons remembered the late Titan sub passenger as a "loving father" and inspiring adventurer in statements giving tribute to their father.

title: Marcus Smart posts emotional goodbye to Boston after nine seasons: 'Thank you for all the love'
description: Marcus Smart posted an emotional goodbye to Boston on Friday after spending his first nine NBA seasons with the Celtics. Smart was traded to the Memphis Grizzlies this week.

title: What to know about the FTC taking on Amazon Prime
description: Amazon is getting sued by the Federal Trade Commission for an alleged use of a deceptive strategy to get customers to register as an Amazon Prime member.

title: Democrats attack 'extreme right-wing' Supreme Court on Dobbs anniversary, vow to 'fight back'
description: Marking the one-year anniversary of the Supreme Court's decision to overturn Roe v. Wade, Democrats took aim at the 'extreme right-wing' Supreme Court over the weekend.

title: Taylor Swift fans without tickets ‘discouraged’ to gather at venue as concertgoers flood in for tour
description: Grammy-Award-winning artist Taylor Swift continued her "The Eras Tour" in Minneapolis as the concert stadium had strict orders in place for her sold-out performances.

title: Kim Kardashian admits to being a member of the mile-high club, says she prefers 'passionate' makeup sex
description: Reality television star Kim Kardashian joined Hailey Bieber in a conversation about being a member of the mile high club and what her sexual preference is.

title: Classical learning schools grow across US in latest push to challenge public school dominance
description: Kelly Niebuhr and Amy Dieckman, the founders of Trinitas Classical Academy, talk about classical education as an alternative to public education.

title: Bryan Kohberger case: Idaho judge holds gag order, but narrows scope
description: Idaho District Judge John C. Judge denied Friday a request to lift a gag order in the case of a man, Bryan Kohberger, who is accused of stabbing and killing four college students.

title: 5 reasons why you want to use Airplane Mode more often
description: Airplane mode can be used in a number of ways outside of traveling by preservation of your battery life, prevent tracking, reduce distractions and more.

title: Active shooter reported in Weirton, West Virginia; police on the scene
description: Police and law enforcement are reporting an active shooter in Weirton, West Virginia, on Saturday afternoon along with other area officials including the Hancock County EMS.

title: Biden admin, foreign officials react as Wagner Group makes 'march for justice' towards Moscow
description: The mercenary Wagner Group started marching towards Moscow after its leader Yevgeny Prigozhin claimed the Kremlin had authorized an attack on his forces Friday.

title: Former Disney Channel star claims to have been 'fired' by network for coming out, deemed 'unsafe’ around kids
description: Former Disney Channel child star Alyson Stoner claimed that the kids network fired her after the actor wrote a Teen Vogue essay coming out as queer in 2018.

title: Assault charge against Raiders wide receiver Davante Adams dismissed
description: The misdemeanor assault charge against Las Vegas Raiders wide receiver Davante Adams was dismissed on June 5th. It stemmed from an October 2022 incident at Arrowhead Stadium.

title: Bulls expecting Lonzo Ball to miss second consecutive season with knee injury
description: The Chicago Bulls are expecting point guard Lonzo Ball to miss the entire 2023-24 NBA season after the point guard underwent a third surgery on his left knee in March.

title: Pentagon silent on whether it notified families of Titanic submersible implosion after initial detection
description: The Pentagon declined to say whether families of those aboard the Titan submersible touring the Titanic were notified after the Navy detected a possible implosion last week.

title: Kansas AG moves to block changing sex on birth certificates
description: Republican Kansas Attorney General Kris Kobach is seeking to end the state's obligation to alter residents' birth certificates to match gender transitions.

title: On Dobbs anniversary, pro-life advocates celebrate wins 'no one thought' were 'possible'
description: Pro-life organizations shared what they have been doing since the Supreme Court's Dobbs decision that overturned the federal right to abortion one year ago.

title: 'Cancelled' streamer's popularity grows after criticizing alleged woke indoctrination
description: A popular video game streamer faced backlash after he said children should be exempt from society's culture wars, but has since seen a boost in popularity.

title: One year after Dobbs, here are challenges facing the pro-life movement
description: June 24, marks the one-year anniversary of the Supreme Court’s Dobbs decision, which overturned Roe v. Wade and held that there is no constitutional right to abortion.

title: Pro-life leaders detail winning message on abortion ahead of 2024, one year after Roe v. Wade overturned
description: One year after the Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade and allowed the states to decide their laws on abortion, Live Action's Lila Rose and abortion activists outline a winning message in 2024.

title: NJ Senate confirms first transgender cabinet official
description: The New Jersey Senate confirmed Allison Myers as Chair and CEO of the state's Civil Service Commission, the state's first transgender cabinet official.

title: Body of New York man, 37, recovered from Washington lake after kayaking trip with fiancée
description: The body of a New York man was recovered Wednesday night from Lake Crescent at Olympic National Park in Washington State. The 37-year-old had been kayaking with his fiancée.

title: Ultimate guide to camping with pets: What to pack and how to prepare for dog-friendly camping activities
description: Camping is a great vacation option if you want to take your pet along for the fun, since many places are dog friendly. Make sure you pack all your gear and prepare properly for your trip.

title: Jake Tapper blasts Robert Kennedy's 'wild and false' story about his vaccine report in rare CNN column
description: In an unusual first-person account, CNN's Jake Tapper blasted a story Democratic presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. told about him recently.

title: Wagner Group forces said to be advancing towards Moscow after capturing Russian military facilities: reports
description: Armed rebels with the Wagner Group are reported to be advancing north towards Moscow after capturing Russian military facilities in the city of Rostov-on-Don.

title: Is your local McDonald's up to par? Chef shares viral test to find out
description: The Fox News Lifestyle Newsletter brings you trending stories on family, travel, food, neighbors helping neighbors, pets, autos, military veterans, heroes, faith and American values.

title: He performed abortions. Now he's pro-life and dedicated to Christ: 'You have to change the human heart'
description: Fox News Channel's Lauren Green interviewed a former abortion doctor, Dr. John Bruchalski, now fervently pro-life, for the 1-year anniversary of the Supreme Court's overturning of Roe v. Wade.

title: 'Exhausted' pastors suffering decline in overall health, respect, friendship: study
description: The overall health of pastors in the U.S. has plunged since 2015 as more say they face declining respect from their community and lack of true friends, according to a recent study.

title: Baby seal caught on camera riding the waves with delighted California surfers
description: A baby seal was caught on camera riding the waves with delighted surfers near San Diego, California, even taking over their boards to sunbathe.

title: Vanna White requests pay raise on ‘Wheel of Fortune’ after Pat Sajak’s retirement: report
description: "Wheel of Fortune" co-host Vanna White reportedly has plans to remain on the beloved game show and is currently in negotiations about her contract.

title: Article argues world must apply 'queer theory' to nuclear weapons policy
description: A publication known to discuss the apocalyptic scenarios wrote a lengthy piece proclaiming how "Queer" identity politics are an essential part of discussing nuclear weapons policy.

title: Chicago shooting death of Fox News analyst Gianno Caldwell's brother reaches year without arrest
description: Fox News analyst Gianno Caldwell and his family are still looking for answers after his 18-year-old brother, Christian, was fatally shot in Chicago in June 2022.

title: Hunter Biden investigation 'integrity' undermined if just half of IRS whistleblowers' claims are true: Turley
description: George Washington University law professor Jonathan Turley told Fox News Digital that if "half" of the IRS whistleblowers' claims about Hunter Biden's tax evasion investigation are true, its "integrity" is on the line.

title: F-16 is the greatest fighter jet of all time and we have the receipts
description: F-16 is the greatest fighter jet of all time and we have the receipts. They defend NATO against Russia and help Taiwan stand up to China. F-16s have earned the top spot.

title: Florida police dismantle squatters' booby-trapped 'meth island'
description: Florida officials say an island known for its drug use that was taken over by squatters is being dismantled as the structures are a safety hazard during hurricane season.

title: Ohio mother charged with murder after allegedly leaving toddler home alone for over a week
description: A Cleveland mother is charged with murder in the death of her 16-month-old daughter after she left the toddler at home alone for more than a week, according to police.

title: California kitty named Nova is 'incredibly affectionate' and needs a loving home
description: Nova is a sweet calico kitty who is looking for a home in the Los Angeles area. She was first adopted as a kitten, but her owner ran into financial issues.

title: Patriotic organization encourages young Americans to enlist in the military
description: Our Community Salutes founder Ken Hartman explains how the organization honors young service men and women on "America Reports."

title: US pedestrian deaths in 2022 highest number in more than 40 years: report
description: More than 7,500 pedestrians were killed while walking along or across a U.S. highway in 2022, marking the highest number of deaths in nearly 40 years.

title: Fox News' Gianno Caldwell calls on FBI to investigate brother's murder: 'I won't stop until there is justice'
description: Fox News political analyst Gianno Caldwell calls on the FBI to take over the investigation into his brother's murder on Friday's "Your World with Neil Cavuto."

title: Journey’s Jonathan Cain recalls frontman Steve Perry leaving the band for good: ‘He was fragile’
description: Journey's keyboardist spoke out about his experience with the '80s rock band in a new Reelz documentary titled "Journey: A Voice Lost…and Found."

title: Russian missile attack on Kyiv causes fire at apartment building, killing 2, injuring 8
description: Debris from destroyed Russian missiles caused a fire in Ukraine's capital city that killed at least two people and injured eight others, Ukrainian military officials reported.

title: Putin vows to defend Russia against armed rebellion led by mercenary chief: 'They will answer for it'
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin vowed to punish everyone involved in the “armed rebellion," describing Wagner Group chief Yevgeny Prigozhin's call to action as treasonous.

title: Gov. DeSantis signs death warrant for man convicted of 'brutal and ruthless' 1988 rape, murder of nurse
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis signed a death warrant for a man convicted in the 1988 rape and murder of a nurse in Brevard County. He is scheduled to be executed in August.

title: Russian mercenary chief says his troops have reached Rostov-on-Don following call for armed rebellion
description: The owner of the Wagner private military contractor who called for an armed rebellion to oust Russia's defense minister said he and his troops reached Rostov-on-Don.

title: On this day in history, June 24, 1997, Air Force releases 'The Roswell Report: Case Closed'
description: The U.S. Air Force released its second public report about the "Roswell Incident," a purported UFO crash in rural New Mexico in 1947. The report denied it was aliens.
